name: Do You Need a Large Carrier for Long Trips/Moving with 2 Cats? Try Lekereise: Luxury Cat Hotel, 2 Cat Carrier with Litter Box & Foldable.(No Hammock) Portable & Easy-Clean. Travel Better Together!
short_description: Multiple Cats: Two large cat carriers that connect in a snap—plus, the side windows can be rolled up or down whenever you need! Ideal for traveling with multiple fur babies.

Spacious 2-in-1 Design: The carrier transforms into a secure playpen or travel crate, suitable for pets up to 35 lbs. Ideal for cats, dogs, and other small to medium pets, it offers comfort and flexibility.
Enhanced Travel Convenience: Comes with a collapsible travel bowl and a litter box. Perfect for car rides, vacations, or camping trips, ensuring your pet's basic needs are met.
Secure and Safe: Features locking zippers to prevent escapes, reinforced stitching, and a stable base to keep your pet secure during travel.
Easy Setup and Storage: Simple assembly with pipe connectors, designed to be safe and user-friendly. The foldable design allows for convenient storage when not in use, saving space.
Superior Ventilation and Visibility: Large mesh windows on all sides provide good airflow and visibility, helping to reduce stress for your pet.
Reliable After-Sales Support: Includes a 12-month warranty. Our customer service team is available to address any issues or concerns you may have with the product.

name: One for Pets Portable 2-in-1 Double Pet Kennel/Shelter, Fabric, Black 20"x20"x39" - Car Seat-Belt Fixture Included
short_description: Travel Carrier: Built-in straps that allow safe connection to a seatbelt; Easy to set up and fold flat in seconds; Pad cover is removable and washable
Cat Travel Carrier: Pet carrier/dog carrier with multiple entrances; Interior hooks for hanging the hammock (Hammock is optional); Comes with an individual carry case for easy storage

Three ways to use the Double Kennel: 1) Use as two connected but divided compartments; 2) Use as one big space by unzipping the center zipper which divides the walls; 3) Detach the Double Kennel into two Single Kennels
Lightweight Travel Carrier: Lightweight and zippered mesh door in the front and at one or both ends. Size: Double: 20" x 20" x 39"

name: Huge Sapce Double Compartment Cat Travel Carrier with Litter Box & Homack | Cat Show Kennel Cage Crate with Mat & Water Bottle
short_description: [Dimension]: Overall dimensions: 47.2" L x19.7" W x 23.6" H, Single room dimensions:22.5" L x 19.7" W x 23.6" H, Package size: 25.6" L x 7.9" W x 22.4" H. Note: Please measure the body length and body height of the your pet before purchasing.

[Ventilated and Easy in & Out]: The vented mesh ensures air permeability in the cat cage and helps you observe your pets. The roll-up curtain protects privacy and keeps out the wind and rain while your pet is resting inside the house or outside in the garage or back yard.The side door and front entrance can be opened for easy entry.

[Foldable & Portable Cat Carrier]: The twin Compartment cat show house can be easily folded and stored in the provided carry bag, allowing you to conveniently take it to beach, park, campsite and so on. The fixed belt on the back can combine with the car seat belt to affix the carrier, making the unit and pets secure while driving.

[Double Compartment Design]: The cat travel carrier brings 2 large room for your furry friends. Moreover, with a zipper in the middle, the 2 compartments can be turned into 1 roomy space for large pets to use.We have two soft and comfortable mat for each part,and have one comfortable hammock. Your cat can rest and play in this happy nest.

[Upgrade Design]: New kennel developed a new aluminium support frame, simple to use, lightweight and more durable,which will not deform after repeated use.The square structure maximizes space utilization.

[Multiple Usages]: The outside cage is made of thick 600D Oxford cloth to prevent pets from scratching and tearing.Apart from dual rooms, the portable cat travel carrier also comes with two water bottles and two foldable litter boxes to meet different demands. The side of the cat apartment has three pockets for snacks and Poop Bags.

[Cat Cage Cleaning Guide]:Cleaning the cat cage is very simple.Method 1:Unfold it and rinse directly under water. Gently scrub if needed, then lay it flat to dry.Method 2:Disassemble and remove the frame. Place the outer fabric cover in the washing machine, then lay it flat to dry.

name: YITAHOME 41'' 2-Tier Cat Cage Cat Crate with Door Locks and Bottom, Three-Door Design Plastic Ferret Cage Large Rabbit Cage Indoor Chinchilla Small Animal Cages Catio with Wheels and Ladder
short_description: GREAT RESIN- This cat cage is made from high-quality resin material with thickened, densified fence to resist impact, rust and deformation; The surface features abrasion, scratch and corrosion resistance without iron cage; Suitable for all situations

THREE-DOOR DESIGN- Open cage roof provides convenience for pets to enter and exit; One door on each floor with door locks to enhance safety; Rotate right to open the door handle; The cage door is designed with a buckle for easy fixation after opening; Cat ladder facilitates easy pet access
BOTTOM PALLET DESIGN- The resin pallet is easy to clean by simply wiping down; Unlike traditional iron cages, our cat crate has a smooth and comfortable bottom so your cats can be more comfortable

EASY TO MOVE- Our cat crate features a universal wheel design at the bottom for easy moving, save time and energy when cleaning or moving the cat cage ; Simple design and soft color matching for an overall better experience

SIMPLE INSTALLATION- Assembly can be completed within 10 minutes by following our instructions; The size of our double layer cat cage is 25.8''L x 20''W x 41''H, suitable for a cat; The size of a single layer cat cage is 29''L x 26''W x 38''H, suitable for 2-4 cats

name: Mispace Portable Twin Compartment Show House Cat Cage/Condo - Easy to Fold & Carry Kennel - Comfy Puppy Home & Dog Travel Crate with Portable Carry Bag/Two Hammocks/Mats and Collapsible Litter Box
short_description: REASONABLE SIZE - The cat condo's size is 100 x 55 x 60 CM ;Weighing just 3.8KG and folds down to a travel size of 68 x 68 x 6 CM.

RELIABLE MATERIAL - The fabric outside cage is made of thick Oxford cloth to prevent pets from scratching and tearing, and it is durable. the frame is made of strong glass rod, which will not deform after repeated use. In addition, there are two front and rear doors with zippers, and the inner floor is made of high-strength mesh, which ensures air permeability. The outer layer is a curtain of Oxford cloth, both of which can be rolled up or pasted through the burr on the bottom and the cage.

NICE COMFORT - The oversized two-compartment structure provides a spacious and comfortable space for your kitten. Inside the cage, the structure is divided into two symmetrical parts, including a zippered Oxford cloth door separating the two sides. Above each part is a detachable fine and comfortable flannelette hammock, and below is the same flannelette mat. Your cat can rest and play in this happy nest, and we also have a foldable litter box, which is as complete as an apartment.

FOLDABLE & PORTABLE - The frame is made of glass pole, which can be easily folded and stored in the one-shoulder bag we provide. You can carry it on your back when you go out , such as going to park, beach and shopping malls, bringing it to your friends to appreciate the small pets you raise.In some pet exhibitions,you can put two small animals together and compare them carefully.

STRONG CUSTOMER SERVICE - The above introduction hope to be helpful to you,our product quality,reasonable price sincerely welcome you to buy,we wholeheartedly for your service;If you have any questions,please feel free to contact us.

name: 25''(L) x 17''(W) x 17''(H) Extra Large Expandable cat Carrier for car Travel,Soft Crate for 1 Large / 2 Medium Cats up to 35 lbs,Long Road Trip cage with a Leakproof Portable Litter Box
short_description: 【For 1 large cat up to 20-25 lbs (cat litter box in carrier),or 1 extra-large cat / 2 medium-large cat up to 35 lbs (cat litter box out of carrier) 】Size of this carrier bag is 25''(L) x 17''(W) x 17''(H),it is very roomy for cats.cats can turn around,walk,play or sleep in this carrier,it will be happy and relaxed for cats,and easy for you in a long car road ride.

【Expandable for more space when cat litter box in carrier】When you travel with cat in a long time car trip,you need a cat litter box.Cat litter box will occupy internal space of carrier and your cat have no enough space to move or sleep.Our carrier can solve this problem,this carrier have a accordion-style expandable part in right side,when expandable part opened,length of carrier is 41'', cat still have enough space when cat litter box in carrier.

【More friendly for cat and you than others that litter box is in extended area】1- ours have more Larger space for cat use. Extended area is smaller than inner space of carrier,your cat may have not enough space to get in and turn around when using litter box.That is why we put litter box in carrier instead of extended area. 2- More safe when moving. if you put litter box in extended area,you should get litter box out from carrier firstly before moving carrier.It is a chance for cat to escape when you opening zippers and removing litter box.But ours have not this issue,it is not necessary to remove litter box.

【Leakproof,foldable and tall-side cat litter box for car travel】This carrier have a portable litter box,size of litter box is 16''(L) x 13''(W) x 12''(H),this litter box is leakproof,liquids will not leak out of it.tall side design will greatly reduce the probability of litters digged out by cat. We also provide a Foldable silicone pet food bowls with cover for you.

【Keep safe and stable in travel】 1- All loading ports have a double zipper lock to prevent pet opening zippers and escaping. 2- All breathing meshes are anti-scratched. 3- Tethers in carrier can be connected to a pet harness. 4- Buckles on back can be connected to the safety-strap of seat. 5- Metal frames are implanted into sides of carrier to keep carrier stable and make sure no collapse on pets. 6- Hard plastics board support the bottom. 7- Washable soft padding in bottom.

【Cat travel accessories For long car road ride,also used for vet visiting,pet camping,cat transportation,emergency situation,cat overnight kennel】2 large pockets to store pet supplies.Hand straps with 2 different styles and a shoulder strap can help you carrying easily.This carrier is suitable for most types of cars,like sedan,SUV,truck,pickup,RV. But NOT FOR mini cars,airplanes,trains,bus,bike and motocycles.Best position is back seat in car.

【Good product quality,One year warranty policy】 D-shaped buckle on carrier and hooks on shoulder strap are made of metal material instead of plastics. 600D Oxford cloth is more durable. We provide a one-year warranty for the quality of our product.Included zippers uckleshooks abric.Damage by improper use mesh damage by animal bite and scratch are not included.
